name: yuletide mosaic stockings
sizes_available: 6” wide x 19” at longest point.  (40.5cm x 48cm)
notes:
create a cozy and festive holiday vibe with this crochet christmas stocking pattern that includes 5 stunning and different designs! this pdf pattern features five unique mosaic crochet designs to make breathtaking crochet stockings that are colorful, seamless, and full of personality.

this is a crochet pattern for the yuletide mosaic crochet stockings. the stockings are crocheted using us sc and dc stitches in the round using the overlay mosaic crochet technique.

*please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english, not a finished product.

pattern features:
size: 6” wide x 19” at longest point. (40.5cm x 48cm) approximately
skill level: intermediate (but the included tutorial makes it accessible for adventurous beginners too!)
stitch: double crochet and single crochet
instant pdf download: including 5 different patterns!
full video tutorial (to support written pattern if you are a visual learner)
us crochet terms
uk stitch conversion chart

why you'll love this pattern:
toe-up construction: crafted seamlessly from the toe to the cuff for a polished finish.
five unique mosaic designs: choose from five distinct patterns to add variety and charm to your holiday décor.
customizable & fun: pick your favorite color combinations to suit your style or gift recipients.
skill level: intermediate – perfect for mosaic crochet enthusiasts or adventurous beginners.

materials needed:
category 3 (double knit) yarn. i used a: premier everyday anti-pilling dk (100% acrylic, 250m/273yds/100g) and b: premier colorfusion (100% acrylic, 298m/325yds/100g) or mellowspun dk and prism dk
yarn a: 1 ball (approx 230 yds)
yarn b: 1 ball (approx 155 yds)
crochet hook 4mm (g) or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern.
yarn needle
scissors
stitch markers

pattern includes:
detailed instructions over 21 pages for 5 stocking designs
stitch guide
mosaic crochet charts
step by step stitch tutorial
colour inspiration pages
full video tutorial
customisation guide

instant download: start crocheting your own christmas crochet stocking today! purchase includes immediate access to the patterns in us crochet terms.

gauge: 
19 sts and 18.5 rounds = 4" by 4"

these stockings are not just holiday décor; they’re heirloom-quality keepsakes that your family will treasure for years. perfect for gifting or decorating your mantle with handmade charm!
get started today and bring festive cheer to your home with these delightful mosaic crochet stockings. ✨

 download instantly and start creating your christmas magic!

need help?
we're here for you! contact us anytime for pattern support or questions.
